data.title: Daniel Tissons on LinkedIn: IBM QRadar SIEM Foundation was issued by IBM to Daniel Tissons.
data.meta_description: Dear Network, Kyndryls & IBMers,I'm happy to share that I‚Äôve obtained a new Certification: IBM QRadar SIEM Foundation from IBM.Time also to publish in my‚Ä¶
data.text:
I proudly share that my employer < Kyndryl > supports important initiatives like the one mentioned in the Certificate below and I'm especially proud to be a part of the Team that participated to the 2024 edition. As our new Country Leader Kyndryl Luxembourg Mark Dietrich quoted "It was inspiring to participate in Relais pour la Vie de la Fondation Cancer Luxembourg at La Coque - a 24-hour charity race to fight cancer! With over 10,000 participants, the passion was palpable, especially from Team Kyndryl Luxembourg. Kudos to this team and our teammate Anke, who's fighting cancer as we run!" - I value every day I can collaborate on various events like this one with my Colleagues (Even if one of them said to me recently "Daniel, you are a team on your own" ;--)). #Relais2024Lux #kyndryl_LUX #theheartofprogress Genevieve Sainlez Elhadj Ousmane SOW Siddharth Gupta Dimitri Criqueliere xavier DAVID Carmen Pe√±a y Mart√≠n Lis Eriksen Rodrigo Cremasco Yacine BENAMRI Isabelle Deronne Marzena Maria Chevray axel de pauw Gajendra Rai Jo√£o Manuel Christian Gillet Filipe Bregieiro GicƒÉ L. Ola Kwiatkowska (Sekala) Iva Barakova Vlkova PMP¬Æ, PMI-ACP¬Æ Christine Saverna Abderrazak HANINI Rachid Ben Aicha Sidi Andrey Ilyukhin Thu-Hong Ngo Manuel Soma Maria Kern Together, we are #strongertogether The fundraiser for the Troph√©es de l'Espoir will close on March 31 at midnight : https://lnkd.in/eNa3TWt4 Of course, we can still continue to make donations beyond this date.

As promised, I‚Äôm happy to share now with you that I‚Äôve obtained a new Certification : Vision One XDR Certified Professional from Trend Micro! We are in fact a solid AntiMalware Team of 6 people in Kyndryl Luxembourg with this promising new Security Certification : Vincent Despat, Ioannis KAPSOPOULOS, Patrick Gorrissen, Abdellah Amarir, Daniel Nibes and me - Thanks to üõ°Ô∏è Jesus ESCOLAR @ EXELERYS for the fantastic training. 6/0 for Kyndryl in Luxembourg against Malware ! üéæüéæüéæüéæüéæüéæ #Kyndryl #TrendMicro #VisionOne #VisionOneXDR #XDR #DeepSecurity #Exelerys

Best wishes for 2024 ! I‚Äôm happy to share that I‚Äôve obtained a new Certification: Site Reliability Engineer Bootcamp from Kyndryl. The set of skills and knowledge involved by the SRE Certification is very interesting : System Thinking for Reliability, Automation, Software Engineering, Troubleshooting, Deploy and Release Services, Monitoring and Event Management, Data-driven & Scientific-approach to Fact Finding, Mathematical Models for Trend Analysis, Tools and Technology across the SDLC, Organizational Knowledge,...and some elements of Security. SRE is also at the core of our Kyndryl Bridge Integrated AIOps Platform. #Kyndryl #SRE #SiteReliabilityEngineer #KyndrylBridge #CyberSecurity

I'm happy to share that I've obtained a new HyperScalers Certification (DP-900) on the Microsoft Azure & Security Map, completing during this year a kind of "Grand Slam" of (4) Good-For-Life Certifications in this area. Happy also to bring my contribution to the Kyndryl's partnership with Microsoft to help our customers to accelerate hybrid cloud adoption, modernize applications and processes, support mission-critical workloads, and enable modern work experiences. To learn more about this Alliance, click https://lnkd.in/e9eEczTg #Kyndryl #Microsoft #Certifications #Partnership #Alliance #IAmProgressInAction

In this CyberSecurity Awareness Month, I‚Äôm happy to share now with you my Trend Micro Education journey so far, with the 3 recent Certifications I got (Last one, "Deep Security 20 Certified Professional" - in the Hybrid Cloud Security domain - valid through December 2024), and my commitment in the learning of the new Trend Micro Vision One solution. To learn more about Cybersecurity Awareness Month 2023, click https://lnkd.in/eY39m4TT #CybersecurityAwarenessMonth #CyberAwarenessFirst #Kyndryl
